Name: Raspberry (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 7 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden. Bringt manchmal mehrere Himbeeren pro Ernte ein.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной. Вырастает через 7 дней и продолжает давать урожай после первого сбора.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 7 days to mature and starts with supports. Continues to produce after first harvest with a chance to yield multiple berries.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春季种植。需要 7 天才能成熟。第一次收获后继续结果，有机会结出多个浆果。
